What's with the "Unknown Source" on most of your stack frames? Are you removing
the source from your workbench or is this another problem?

Good question.

Actually I don't know. Will have an eye on it.

I don't see where the NPE in this case is coming from. The
LogicalStructureProvider is accessing two instance variables, both of which are
loaded via extension. And in both cases if the object fails to be loaded we log
the exception. So if either of these objects were null, the reason would have
showed up in the log along with the NPE.

The only other variable here is the parameter "value", which is computed up in
VariablesViewContentProvider#getChildren(...) with a call to
IVariable#getValue(...), which isn't specced to ever return null.
